name: PUBLIC FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT FOR RURAL DEVT PROJECT
info: The program's objective is to assist in implementing public financial management (PFM) reforms in three rural development ministries, including support to strengthen the capacity of the National Audit Authority (NAA). The program and related project will improve the overall governance framework and support government efforts to meet PFM benchmarks essential to allocating resources efficiently and managing expenditures effectively, transparently, and accountably.
